attributes.action: MPs should legally be mandated to use public services
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned think that since Members of Parliament make decisions on services that affect us all, they should be mandated legally to use these same services.

Hence, no MP should be allowed private health care, whether publicly paid or paid for out of their own pocket. All MPs must send their children, regardless of age to a comprehensive school instead of private schooling.

MP's should also be encouraged to use public transport wherever possible, except for obvious security concerns.
